data.name: ReadCase
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, STATUS_DATE from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCaseUnit
data.value: select CU_NUMBER, [STATE], START_DATE, CLOSURE_DATE, CLOSURE_REASON_COD, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, CAS_NO from CKT_CASE_UNIT where @casNo = CAS_NO order by LAST_UPDATED_TMST desc
